definition: eldest of father's younger brothers/uncle (term used to address a man about the age of one's father)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
uncle/father's younger brother/husband's younger brother/Taiwan pr. [shu2]

sentences.english: THE uncle had a great fall and is now in hospital nursing a fractured wrist.
sentences.chinese: 大叔摔倒了，現在在醫院裏，左手腕打着石膏。

sentences.english: Uncle Wang was waiting for them outside the factory gate.
sentences.chinese: 王大叔在工廠大門外等他們。

sentences.english: On the way back we stopped once more at the uncle's house in Kumjung.
sentences.chinese: 返程途中，我們又在昆坰那位大叔家稍事停留。

sentences.english: You can take Uncle Sam before a world court.
sentences.chinese: 在國際法庭之前，你能夠抓到山姆大叔。

sentences.english: The students walked through the gate with Uncle Li.
sentences.chinese: 學生們和李大叔走過大門。

sentences.english: However, Deke has trouble matching up against faster-paced teams.
sentences.chinese: 但木大叔在快攻體系下有明顯的弱點。

sentences.english: So, D dint big uncle, aftertime's your self-discipline cans not stop, either.
sentences.chinese: 所以，丁力大叔，今後的你的修煉也不能停止。

sentences.english: East strains and to the beer room help uncle took the opportunity to give them, manufacturing time.
sentences.chinese: 東株又到啤酒屋幫助，大叔趁機給他們製造時機。

sentences.english: Thinks that Deke plays to the utmost of his ability every single game.
sentences.chinese: 認爲大叔在每一場比賽中就盡全力的發揮。

sentences.english: Only one counterforce was available, and that was you, Uncle Sam.
sentences.chinese: 只有一種反作用力，那就是你，山姆大叔。

sentences.english: Why does human including Marsian hate Uncle Sam?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼人類包括火星人都討厭山姆大叔？

sentences.english: There is no question in my mind that it is Mt.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，這個人毫無疑問是非洲大山木大叔。

sentences.english: Road to see a blind Uncle and a clothing of the past, Flowery cooperating.
sentences.chinese: 路上見到一個盲人大叔和一個衣杉藍縷的大媽。

sentences.english: Mutombo's strength is defending the paint and the rim.
sentences.chinese: 穆大叔的能力僅僅是防守內線和籃圈。

sentences.english: He listened to me repeat what Uncle Li had said the day before.
sentences.chinese: 他聽我把李大叔頭天說的話又講了一遍。

sentences.english: The Rockets' Dikembe Mutombo was saluted at the State of the Union by President Bush.
sentences.chinese: 布什在國家講話中向穆大叔致意。

definition: father's elder brother's wife/aunt (affectionate term for an elderly woman)
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
maternal aunt/step-mother/childcare worker/nursemaid/woman of similar age to one's parents (term of address used by child)/CL:個|个[ge4]
big sister/elder sister/older sister (also polite term of address for a girl or woman slightly older than the speaker)
eldest brother/big brother (polite address for a man of about the same age as oneself)/gang leader/boss
(coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
father's younger brother/uncle/Taiwan pr. [shu2 shu5]/CL:個|个[ge4]
